meaning: the use of imagination or original ideas to create something
a new method, idea, product, etc.
the faculty or action of forming new ideas, or images or concepts of external objects not present to the senses
the ability to think independently and creatively
the quality of being clever, original, and inventive
the ability to find quick and clever ways to overcome difficulties
the quality of being able to adjust to new conditions
the quality of bending easily without breaking
the ability to adapt or be adapted to many different functions or activities
the practice or quality of including or involving people from a range of different social and ethnic backgrounds
